description: Chulalongkorn University, nicknamed Chula, is a public and autonomous research university in Bangkok, Thailand. I'm currently majoring in Computer Engineering. I've been able to take on many challenging duties, such as organizing a camp for high school students, and being a secretary in a Public Speaking club.

Rayongwittayakom School is the provincial school of my hometown, Rayong. I joined this school because of its highly famous Computer Science class 'Wit-Com'. While I was studying there, I gained many valuable experiences, such as being a president of the class student committee, and developing many game applications for competing in national-level competitions.
